dcterms:creator: A. Dochhan
H. Griesser
M. Eiselt
dcterms:description: The 3D-Simplex modulation format offers potentially 1.2 dB higher OSNR tolerance than DP-BPSK while exhibiting the same spectral occupancy, modulating two bits per symbol. This benefit is verified experimentally and evaluated in a non-linear transmission environment.
dcterms:title: 3D-Simplex Modulation Format

dcterms:creator: E. Agrell
dcterms:description: DP-BPSK is a modulation format used for comparison in the evaluation of the 3D-Simplex format, known for its power-efficient characteristics in coherent transmission systems.
dcterms:title: DP-BPSK

dcterms:creator: M. Eiselt
A. Dochhan
W. Rosenkranz
dcterms:description: DP-DPSK is another modulation format used as a benchmark in the study, particularly in assessing OSNR sensitivity and performance in multi-level modulation formats.
dcterms:title: DP-DPSK
